text: Bai ouxiang zhe jiang shuo:“Jiaru an la yiyu, women ji bu hui bai ouxiang, women de zuxian ye bu hui, erqie women bu hui bei jinzhi [shiyong] renhe dongxi.” Tamen de qian ren ye tongyang fourenguo, zhidao tamen changshile wo de chengfa. Ni shuo:“Nimen you renhe zhishi [zhengju] ma? Nimen gan na chulai gei women kan ma? Nimen zhi shuncong caixiang, nimen zong shi shuohuang [zhu].”
